descriptionHtml:
Adds a companion to Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Name is Raven and her looks are done accordingly to her namesake. All features of a normal follower included.

Current version adds quest Raven will give you. The enemies in dungeon are not particularly easy. Quest dialogue is not voiced. I don\'t know anyone who sounds like femaleEvenToned. Will probably try voicing it myself later. End of quest gives upgrade for Raven.

If you encounter any bugs, post them on comments ASAP, along with screencap if its visual bug or if you\'d like to show me just how naked you can be in skyrim.

-------------------
VERSION
[u]Ver 1[/u]
Worked only on my comp, had a weird .esp overwriting some stuff
[u]Ver 1.1[/u]
Was not a follower
[u]Ver 1.3[/u]
Got my shit together, is working version
[u]Ver 1.4[/u]
Added a quest for Raven. The quest dialogue is not currently voiced, so you probably won\'t know whats happening. The entrance to dungeon may be invisible, this is an error in creation kit not rendering large objects in worldspace. End of quest item will upgrade Raven combat, as long as she\'s wearing it.

-------------------
[b][u]Required Mod[/u][/b]
(unless you want her bald)
ApachiiSkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

-------------------
INSTALL

Drop .bsa and .esp file into your Data folder
-Put at bottom of load list (as close as possible)
-atm probably doesn\'t work with UFO, (you won\'t get the options to strip her, mark essential etc) *EDIT: Works with UFO, just make sure this comes after the UFO.esp
-As a general rule of thumb, mods that affect the most game content go top of load, little mods to the bottom

-------------------
Recommended mods

You will need these to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

-------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
